item.title: Hosted PBX Adds Video Services
item.description:
Cloud-based phone systems, also known as Hosted VoIP or Hosted PBX, are gaining popularity with businesses of all sizes. This technology offers advanced features without requiring a large upfront investment. Now, these systems are evolving to incorporate video services as well. MegaPath, a leading network and cloud service provider, is enhancing its hosted PBX offerings by including cloud-based unified communications video services. A new generation of business phones makes voice and video integration possible...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/hosted-pbx-adds-video-services/
